Forgot to include this in my last post.

::Ramulus::

"Next thing I remember is waking up in a CR chamber, but I had died," Ramulus 
shruggs, "As close as the computer reported, my body was put into the CR 
chamber, and, after several weeks, a power surge summoned my spark back."
